#
# Automagically generated by Approximatrix Simply Fortran 3.15
#

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0 FATAL_ERROR)
project(easifemBaseModules LANGUAGES Fortran VERSION 1.0.0)

add_library(easifemBaseObj OBJECT foo.f90 )
set_target_properties(easifemBaseObj PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 1)

if( CMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER_ID MATCHES GNU)
	list(APPEND FORTRAN_FLAGS "-O2" "-cpp" "-fPIC" "-ffree-line-length-512")
	list(APPEND FORTRAN_FLAGS_DEBUG "-g" "-Wextra" "-Wall" "-std=f2008" "-pedantic" "-cpp" "-fPIC" "-fall-intrinsics" "-ffree-line-length-512")
	list( APPEND FORTRAN_FLAGS_RELEASE "-O2" "-cpp" "-fPIC" "-ffree-line-length-512")
endif()

target_compile_options(easifemBaseObj
  PRIVATE
    ${FORTRAN_FLAGS}
    "$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:${FORTRAN_FLAGS_DEBUG}>"
    "$<$<CONFIG:Release>:${FORTRAN_FLAGS_RELEASE}>"
)

add_library(libeasifemBase-submodule STATIC $<TARGET_OBJECTS:easifemBaseObj>)
